## TinySynq class

The main class for managing SQLite3 synchronisation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TinySynq extends TinySynqSync 
```
**Extends:** TinySynqSync

## Remarks

Expects SQLite3 version &gt;<!-- -->=3.45.1
